string.text:
Classic Camel flavor with a smooth finish. A solid choice for stalkers who like a bit of class with their radiation burns. Not imported into The Zone often, hence the price tag on it is fairly high.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Stimulant
 %c[d_green] • %c[pda_white] Alcohol Sobering Effect
